channel.title: Couple Questions for model makers
channel.description:
Ok... What the title says
1. How come I can't open my model in the dat maker? (What do I save it as also)
2. Do I have to make my model 3D or do I leave it flat (Swords)
3. Is there any easy way with Metasquoia? (HARD)
Ok that's my main questions I want to have answered
Thanks,
Check my sig ;D

item.title: Couple Questions for model makers
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

Yeah I figured out the moving camera thing but I got troubles making it parallel

Read full topic

item.title: Couple Questions for model makers
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Nah, just takes practice.

Once you get it, its like riding a bike.
However; if you want a tip: Move the camera so you get a better view of making 3D faces.

Read full topic

item.title: Couple Questions for model makers
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

Hehe reason I ask is cause Making it 3D is more harder than making the base… =P

How is Metasquoia easy for you?

Possibly am I doing it wrong? I just use the create thing and make a whole bunch of points. =/

Read full topic

item.title: Couple Questions for model makers
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Metasquoia is really easy compared to others.
Make it 3D if you wish, unless you want a really thing sword.

Read full topic
